name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Roderick Kevin BICKERSTAFF, Sr.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Roderick Kevin BICKERSTAFF, Sr.

opinions.text: Roderick Kevin Bickerstaff, Sr., of Los Angeles, California, is suspended from practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Roderick Kevin BICKERSTAFF, Sr.
No. D-2782.
Supreme Court of the United States
Aug. 11, 2014.
Opinion
